name: Fate & the Hero
description:
One of you is Fate. The other is a Hero. Both of you will tell a story about how the Hero overcomes their Fate, or how Fate overwhelms the Hero.

A 2 player Rock Paper Scissors game determines how the story unfolds. Will this be a tragic tale of unavoidable destiny or a glorious legend?

{currently available for free in the sidebar as part of the Tiny Tome single-page RPG jam}
